nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils

Class AdHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils.AdHelper

  • public class AdHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for ads
    WARN: Be aware that this helper doesn't access the services through the security layer. They are all local services.
    Author:
    luis
